name: FUNeral (yellowBeatle)
description:
You are stuck in a funeral, the only time killer is your phone but, SOMEONE HAS SENT YOU HILARIOUS MEMES!! In order to avoid laughter, you must close as fast as you can the pop-up memes. The red ones by pressing the red button while the green ones the green one. HURRY UP!!

This mini game was developed in the Barcelona Games World Jam and was rewarded with the most Original Game award. Thanks for playing!!
